Class Showing

java.lang.Object
Showing
public class Showing extends Object
Objects of this class represent a given showing at a cinema, described by theater (location) and date/time. Holds a collection of seats that can be marked available or unavailable.

      Parameters:
      film - The film of the showing.
      year - The year of the showing.
      month - The month of the showing.
      day - The day of the month of the showing.
      hour - The hour of the time of the showing.
      minute - The minute of the time of the showing.
      theater - The theater in which the film will be shown.

    • getAdjacent

      public ArrayList<String> getAdjacent(String start, String end)
      Returns a list of adjacent seat numbers, given a start and end seat number. If the parameters are out of order, their values are reversed. If they are not in the same row, returns an empty list.
      Parameters:
      start - First of the adjacent seats.
      end - Last of the adjacent seats.
      Returns:
      A list of adjacent seat numbers.

    • findAdjacent

      public ArrayList<String> findAdjacent()
      Searches for adjacent available seats and returns a list strings, with each string representing a set of available seats.
      Returns:
      A list of strings, each describing a range of available adjacent seats.

    • getOpenSeats

      public ArrayList<Seat> getOpenSeats()
